mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.jiudian_id as jiudianId ,a.yonghu_id as yonghuId ,a.jiudian_liuyan_text as jiudianLiuyanText ,a.reply_text as replyText ,a.insert_time as insertTime ,a.update_time as updateTime ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
-- 级联表的字段 ,jiudian.jiudian_name as jiudianName ,jiudian.jiudian_types as jiudianTypes ,jiudian.jiudian_money as jiudianMoney ,jiudian.jiudian_photo as jiudianPhoto ,jiudian.jiudian_address as jiudianAddress ,jiudian.jiudian_content as jiudianContent ,yonghu.yonghu_name as yonghuName ,yonghu.yonghu_photo as yonghuPhoto ,yonghu.yonghu_phone as yonghuPhone ,yonghu.yonghu_id_number as yonghuIdNumber ,yonghu.yonghu_email as yonghuEmail ,yonghu.yonghu_delete as yonghuDelete
FROM jiudian_liuyan a left JOIN jiudian jiudian ON a.jiudian_id = jiudian.id left JOIN yonghu yonghu ON a.yonghu_id = yonghu.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.jiudian_id = #{params.jiudianId} )
and ( a.yonghu_id = #{params.yonghuId} )
and a.jiudian_liuyan_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiudianLiuyanText},'%')
and a.reply_text like CONCAT('%',#{params.replyText},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.insert_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.insertTimeEnd})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) >= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeStart})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(a.update_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{params.updateTimeEnd})
and a.jiudian_id IS NOT NULL
and jiudian.jiudian_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiudianName},'%')
and jiudian.jiudian_types = #{params.jiudianTypes}
and jiudian.jiudian_money >= #{params.jiudianMoneyStart}
and jiudian.jiudian_money <= #{params.jiudianMoneyEnd}
and jiudian.jiudian_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiudianAddress},'%')
and jiudian.jiudian_content like CONCAT('%',#{params.jiudianContent},'%')
and a.yonghu_id IS NOT NULL
and yonghu.yonghu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuName},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuPhone},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuIdNumber},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yonghuEmail},'%')
and yonghu.yonghu_delete >= #{params.yonghuDeleteStart}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete <= #{params.yonghuDeleteEnd}
and yonghu.yonghu_delete = #{params.yonghuDelete}
order by a.${params.orderBy} desc
